archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: Gochujang Chorizo Fried Rice with Habanero-Lime Cucumber Pickles and Sesame Cabbage Slaw
description: Hot, from-scratch fried rice with chorizo and gochujang, served with quick habanero-lime cucumber pickles and a crisp sesame cabbage slaw. Multi-component, bold flavors for an advanced family cook.
prep_steps: Rinse 2 cups jasmine rice until water runs clear; drain.
Dice 300 g chorizo into small cubes.
Finely chop 1 onions, 3 garlic cloves, and 2 spring onion (whites and greens separated).
Dice 1 carrots and 1 bell peppers; finely chop 1 habanero peppers (seeds optional).
Slice 1 cucumber thinly for pickles; shred 1/2 head cabbage.
In a small bowl, whisk the fried-rice sauce: 2 tbsp gochujang, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, 1 tsp sugar, 1 tsp sesame oil.
In another bowl, mix pickling liquid: 2 tbsp rice vinegar, juice of 1/2 lime, 1/2 tsp sugar, pinch of salt; add half the chopped habanero peppers.
Toss sliced cucumber in the pickling liquid; set aside.
For slaw, combine shredded cabbage with 1 tsp sesame oil, 1 tbsp rice vinegar, juice of 1/2 lime, pinch of salt, and 1 tsp sesame seeds.
Drain and rinse 1 cup black beans; set out 1 cup corn.
Beat 3 eggs with a pinch of salt.
cook_steps: Cook rice: add rinsed jasmine rice and 2 1/4 cups water to a pot; bring to a boil, then cover and simmer on low until tender (12–15 min). Spread on a tray to steam off and cool 10 minutes.
Heat a large wok or skillet over medium-high; add 1 tbsp oil. Render and brown chorizo 4–5 minutes; remove to a bowl, leaving the fat in the pan.
Add beaten eggs; scramble just set, 30–60 seconds. Remove to the chorizo bowl.
Add 1 tbsp oil if needed; stir-fry onions, garlic, carrots, and bell peppers 3–4 minutes until crisp-tender.
Add corn and black beans; stir-fry 1 minute. Stir in remaining chopped habanero peppers for heat.
Add cooled rice; stir-fry 2–3 minutes, breaking up clumps.
Pour in the fried-rice sauce; toss until evenly coated and glossy, 1–2 minutes.
Return chorizo and eggs; add spring onion whites and half the greens. Toss 1 minute to heat through. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Finish with 1 tsp sesame oil and 1 tsp sesame seeds. Remove from heat.
Serve fried rice topped with remaining spring onion greens. Plate with a side of sesame cabbage slaw and the habanero-lime cucumber pickles. Serve lime wedges if desired.
